name: Young Earth Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., fly 40 ft., burrow 60 ft.
description: The Young Earth Dragon is a large and powerful creature with impressive scales that blend into rocky environments.
memorable: It can camouflage itself as a natural rock formation and has the ability to effortlessly burrow through the earth.
goals: Often acts as a guardian of natural landscapes, particularly earth and stone.
relations: May interact or have a bond with other earth-related creatures, including elementals and other dragons.
environment: Typically found in rocky terrains, caves, or mountainous areas.
strengths: Resists damage from nonmagical weapons and has high Constitution.
weaknesses: Average intelligence and charisma may limit its spellcasting and social skills.
attacks: Uses a multiattack strategy including a powerful bite and a damaging slam.
most_powerful_ability: Scouring Breath unleashes a cone of sand and stones, dealing substantial area damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and tremorsense up to 60 feet, with a keen passive perception of 20.
skills: Excels in athletics, insight, and perception, providing it with strong awareness and physical capabilities.
additional_information: Capable of camouflaging itself as a natural rock formation.
Spiritually linked to a specific area affecting its resting capability.
Can cast spells like Locate Animals or Plants and Spike Growth without components.
Can cause fatigue and strife to creatures entering its essence-linked area.
Burrows through earth without disturbing the ground, surprising enemies.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting based on Charisma, allowing it to cast certain spells multiple times a day.
test_queries: large dragon that camouflages into rocks
dragon with ability to burrow through earth
earth guardian that breathes scouring sand
powerful dragon with innate spellcasting abilities
dragon living in rocky mountainous areas
